data.name: FormatTimeIntervalInfoFormatString
data.value: Specifies the format string to display the datetime value by the control.

data.name: FormatTimeIntervalInfoAutoFormat
data.value: Specifies whether the date format is dependant on the bound time cells.

data.name: ExtraCellsOptionsVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the extra cells are printed below the scheduling area of the report.

data.name: ExtraCellsOptionsMinCount
data.value: Gets or sets the mimimum number of extra cells printed below the scheduling area in the report.

data.name: DayViewTimeRulerTimeRuler
data.value: Provides access to the options which characterize the TimeRuler object.

data.name: DayViewTimeRulerTimeCells
data.value: Gets or sets the DayViewTimeCells control linked to the current DayViewTimeRuler.

data.name: DayViewTimeRulerCustomDrawDayViewTimeRuler
data.value: Enables the DayViewTimeRuler to be printed in a custom manner.

data.name: DayViewTimeRulerCorners
data.value: Provides access to the options defined for proper alignment of the DayViewTimeRuler control.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsVisibleWeekDays
data.value: Gets or sets which days of the week are shown in the report.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsVisibleTimeSnapMode
data.value: Specifies whether the start of the scheduler visible interval should be displayed as set without adjusting it to a custom time ruler.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsVisibleTime
data.value: Gets or sets the visible time interval of the day.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsView
data.value: Gets or sets the associated view.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsVerticalLayoutType
data.value: Gets or sets how the time cells are fitted within the control's boundaries.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsTimeScale
data.value: Gets or sets the time scale used to define time cells.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsStatusLineWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of Status Lines for the Day View (measured in pixels).

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsShowWorkTimeOnly
data.value: Specifies whether the displayed time interval is restricted to work time only.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsShowAllDayArea
data.value: Specifies whether the all-day area is visible.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsShowAllAppointmentsAtTimeCells
data.value: Speicifies whether all-day appointments are shown in the time cells instead of the all-day area.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsPrintColorSchemas
data.value: Provides access to options specifying the color mode for printing of certain view elements.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsHorizontalHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets the HorizontalDateHeaders or the HorizontalResourceHeaders control linked to the DayViewTimeCells.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsExtraCells
data.value: Provides access to the characteristics of the extra cells, printed below the scheduling area in the Day View.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsCustomDrawDayViewAllDayArea
data.value: Enables the all-day area of the DayView report to be painted in a custom manner.

data.name: DayViewTimeCellsAppointmentDisplayOptions
data.value: Provides access to options specifying the visual aspects of appointments in the report.

data.name: DayViewControlBaseView
data.value: Gets or sets a linked View component.

data.name: DayOfWeekHeadersView
data.value: Gets or sets the associated view.

data.name: DayOfWeekHeadersTimeCells
data.value: Gets or sets the HorizontalWeek control associated with the current DayOfWeekHeaders control.

data.name: DayOfWeekHeadersCustomDrawDayOfWeekHeader
data.value: Enables the DayOfWeekHeaders control to be painted in a custom manner.

data.name: DataDependentControlBasePrintInColumn
data.value: Specifies in which columns the control is printed.

data.name: ControlCornersOptionsTop
data.value: Gets or sets an indent from the top corner.

data.name: ControlCornersOptionsBottom
data.value: Gets or sets an indent from the bottom corner.

data.name: CalendarControlTimeCells
data.value: Gets or sets the time cells control associated with the current CalendarControl control.

data.name: CalendarControlCustomDrawDayNumberCell
data.value: Provides the ability to custom paint dates in the Calendar control.

data.name: HorizontalDateHeadersHorizontalHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets the HorizontalResourceHeaders control associated with the current HorizontalDateHeaders control.

data.name: HorizontalDateHeadersCustomDrawDayHeader
data.value: Enables day headers to be painted in a custom manner.

data.name: FullWeekVerticalHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets the VerticalResourceHeaders control associated with the current FullWeek control.

data.name: FullWeekHorizontalHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets the HorizontalResourceHeaders control associated with the current FullWeek control.

data.name: FullWeekAppointmentDisplayOptions
data.value: Provides access to options specifying the visual aspects of appointments in the report.

data.name: FormatTimeIntervalInfoTimeCells
data.value: Gets or sets the time cells determining the date ranges displayed in the control.

data.name: HorizontalResourceHeadersCustomDrawResourceHeader
data.value: Enables horizontal resource headers to be painted in a custom manner.

data.name: HorizontalResourceHeadersHorizontalHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets the HorizontalDateHeaders control associated with the current HorizontalResourceHeaders control.

data.name: HorizontalResourceHeadersOptions
data.value: Provides access to an object specifying appearance options for a scheduler report's resource headers.

data.name: HorizontalWeekAppointmentDisplayOptions
data.value: Provides access to options specifying the visual aspects of appointments in the report.

data.name: HorizontalWeekCanGrow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the cell's height can grow to display the contents in full.

data.name: HorizontalWeekCanShrink
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell's height can decrease if its content does not completely fill the control.

data.name: HorizontalWeekCompressWeekend
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating if the weekend days (Saturday and Sunday) should be printed as one day.

data.name: HorizontalWeekHorizontalHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets the HorizontalResourceHeaders control associated with the current HorizontalWeek control.

data.name: HorizontalWeekVerticalLayoutType
data.value: Gets or sets how the time cell rows are fitted within the control's boundaries.

data.name: HorizontalWeekVisibleWeekDays
data.value: Gets or sets days of the week visible in the HorizontalWeek control.

data.name: ReportDayViewAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the ReportDayView's elements.

data.name: ReportDayViewVisibleDayColumnCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of days in a columns in which the group of days specified by the ReportDayView.VisibleDayCount is split.

data.name: ReportDayViewVisibleDayCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of days in a group.

data.name: ReportMonthViewAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the ReportMonthView's elements.

data.name: ReportMonthViewExactlyOneMonth
data.value: Specifies whether exactly one month is printed on a page, and trailing dates are not shown.

data.name: ReportTimelineViewAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the ReportTimelineView's elements.

data.name: ReportTimelineViewScales
data.value: Provides access to a collection of time scales in the view.

data.name: ReportTimelineViewVisibleIntervalColumnCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of sections in which the group of intervals specified by the ReportTimelineView.VisibleIntervalCount is split.

data.name: ReportTimelineViewVisibleIntervalCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of intervals in a group.

data.name: ReportTimelineViewVisibleIntervalsSplitting
data.value: Gets or sets the time interval to which columns are aligned on pages.

data.name: ReportViewBaseAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the ReportViewBase's elements.

data.name: ReportViewBaseColumnArrangement
data.value: Specifies the order in which the numbers of intervals in columns are arranged.

data.name: ReportViewBaseGroupType
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies the type of grouping applied to the View.

data.name: ReportViewBaseVisibleResourceCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of resources displayed in one section.

data.name: ReportWeekViewAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the ReportWeekView's elements.

data.name: ReportWeekViewVisibleWeekCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of weeks in a group.

data.name: ReportWeekViewVisibleWeekDayColumnCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of columns into which the week can be split.

data.name: ResourceInfoResourceDelimiter
data.value: Gets or sets the symbol or group of symbols used as a delimiter in the resource list, printed using the ResourceInfo control.

data.name: ResourceInfoTimeCells
data.value: Gets or sets the time cells control associated with the current ResourceInfo control.

data.name: SchedulerControlPrintAdapterSchedulerControl
data.value: Gets or sets the Scheduler control which is the source of the XtraSchedulerReport.

data.name: TextInfoControlBaseAutoScaleFont
data.value: Gets or sets whether the control's font is modified automatically, so that the text fits the control's dimensions.

data.name: TextInfoControlBaseCustomizeText
data.value: Occurs before the control is rendered, and enables you to modify the text being printed.

data.name: TextInfoControlBaseFont
data.value: Gets or sets the font used to print the text in the informational controls.

data.name: TextInfoControlBaseForeColor
data.value: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.

data.name: TimeCellsControlBaseAppointmentDisplayOptions
data.value: Provides access to options specifying the visual aspects of appointments in the report.

data.name: TimeCellsControlBaseAppointmentViewInfoCustomizing
data.value: Enables you to customize the appointment's appearance by modifying the style elements when it is printed.

data.name: TimeCellsControlBaseCustomDrawAppointment
data.value: Enables appointments to be painted in a custom manner.

data.name: TimeCellsControlBaseCustomDrawAppointmentBackground
data.value: Enables the backgrounds of appointments to be painted in a custom manner.

data.name: TimeCellsControlBaseCustomDrawTimeCell
data.value: Enables time cells to be painted in a custom manner.

data.name: TimeCellsControlBaseInitAppointmentDisplayText
data.value: Enables you to modify the text in the appointment.

data.name: TimeCellsControlBaseInitAppointmentImages
data.value: Enables you to print custom images within the appointment.

data.name: TimeCellsControlBasePrintColorSchemas
data.value: Provides access to options specifying the color mode for printing certain view elements.

data.name: TimeIntervalInfoBasePrintContentMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the time interval for display is chosen.

data.name: TimeIntervalInfoFormatType
data.value: Specifies the format pattern used to print information in the TimeIntervalInfo control.

data.name: TimeIntervalInfoTimeCells
data.value: Gets or sets the time cells control associated with the current TimeIntervalInfo control.

data.name: TimelineCellsCanGrow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the cell's height can grow to display the contents in full.

data.name: TimelineCellsCanShrink
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell's height can decrease if its content does not completely fill the control.

data.name: TimelineCellsHorizontalHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets the horizontal headers control linked to the TimelineCells.

data.name: TimelineCellsShowMoreItems
data.value: Specifies whether the \"More items...\" text is printed in the column that contains hidden appointments.

data.name: TimelineCellsVerticalLayoutType
data.value: Gets or sets how the time cell rows fit within the control's boundaries.

data.name: TimelineCellsView
data.value: Gets or sets the associated view.

data.name: TimelineScaleHeadersCustomDrawDayHeader
data.value: Enables timeline headers to be painted in a custom manner.

data.name: TimelineScaleHeadersHorizontalHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets the HorizontalResourceHeaders control linked to the TimeScaleHeaders control.

data.name: TimelineScaleHeadersView
data.value: Gets or sets the associated view.

data.name: VerticalResourceHeadersCorners
data.value: Provides access to settings that characterize how the control corners should be adjusted for proper alignment with linked controls.

data.name: VerticalResourceHeadersCustomDrawResourceHeader
data.value: Enables vertical resource headers to be painted in a custom manner.

data.name: VerticalResourceHeadersOptions
data.value: Provides access to an object specifying appearance options for a scheduler report's resource headers.

data.name: VerticalResourceHeadersTimeCells
data.value: Gets or sets the time cells control associated with the current VerticalResourceHeaders control.

data.name: XtraSchedulerReportPrintColorSchema
data.value: Gets or sets the color mode used to print the report.

data.name: XtraSchedulerReportSchedulerAdapter
data.value: Gets or sets the scheduler adapter for the current report.
